name: Car Driving: Racing in City
description:
Release the car race and drive race car games at full speed different areas of the city. Drive and drift your car with full speed and make some boosts on the city asphalts control the high speed vehicle and become a real car road racer.

Features:
• Extremely Super Car Driving sim .
• Amazing collection of Super formula sports cars.
• High Quality visuals and 3D graphics.
• Most realistic City Car driving simulation.
• Extremely smooth and easy Multi controls.
• Super Marvelous sounds and unique music tracks.
• Realistic simulator experience.
